fields.name: Flame Burst
fields.description: Unleashes a burst of fiery energy.

fields.name: Hydro Vortex
fields.description: Summons a powerful water vortex.

fields.name: Tremor Quake
fields.description: Causes tremors and earthquakes.

fields.name: Gust Whirlwind
fields.description: Summons a fierce whirlwind.

fields.name: Mystical Summoning
fields.description: Summons mystical entities from other planes.

fields.name: Inferno Beam
fields.description: Projects a focused beam of intense fire.

fields.name: Aqua Blast
fields.description: Blasts targets with a forceful water attack.

fields.name: Rockslide
fields.description: Causes a cascade of powerful rocks.

fields.name: Air Slash
fields.description: Slices through with razor-sharp air currents.

fields.name: Spiritual Channeling
fields.description: Channels mystical energies from spiritual realms.

fields.name: Scorching Ember
fields.description: Engulfs targets in fiery embers.

fields.name: Tidal Wave
fields.description: Summons a massive wave for an overwhelming attack.

fields.name: Quicksand Trap
fields.description: Traps opponents in quicksand.

fields.name: Cyclone Burst
fields.description: Creates a fierce cyclone to sweep away targets.

fields.name: Ethereal Blast
fields.description: Unleashes a surge of otherworldly energies.

fields.name: Blazing Inferno
fields.description: Ignites everything in a blazing inferno.

fields.name: Frostbite
fields.description: Freezes targets with icy bites.

fields.name: Mudslide
fields.description: Creates a slide of thick, sticky mud.

fields.name: Whirlwind Slice
fields.description: Slices through with a razor-sharp whirlwind.

fields.name: Spiritual Infusion
fields.description: Infuses targets with potent spiritual essence.
